title: Pecan Chocolate Biscotti
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '1 tablespoon instant coffee granules', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '375g plain flour', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '125g ricotta cheese', '60g unsalted butter', '2 eggs', '75ml milk, scalded and cooled', '4 tablespoons chocolate hazelnut spread, like Nutella', '60g chopped pecans', '85g plain chocolate chips', '175ml double cream', '250g plain chocolate, chopped']
